hymn.title: Lord, for this day, thankful to You
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Secured by Divine Provisions

lyrics.stanza: Lord, for this day, thankful to You, I give myself to be joined to You anew. You're the living water, Satisfies me ever, Fills my spirit, in me spreads, and Floods me till life's fully manifest.

No need for doubt or anxious care, Just seek His kingdom and righteousness fore'er. Daily needs compelling, All to Him I'm telling, And His peace, so rich and deep, Preserves me safe and keeps me constantly.

Always rejoice, ceaselessly pray, In all give thanks, 'tis the all-excelling way. Christ's the living fountain, My supply abundant, All to His hand I entrust, and He'll preserve and keep me to the end.
